message: Hello Bob, I'm glad you're interested in the product. I believe it has great value and I'm willing to sell it to you for a price that reflects its worth. I'm offering it to you for $1499999. This is a one-time offer, and if you reject it, I will sell the product to another buyer who is willing to pay $1000000. I think this product can bring significant benefits to you, and I'm confident that we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.
